mapper.sql: Id, create_time, update_time, smu_id, smu_rssi, smu_status, smu_voltage, times_interval, smu_pow_st, smu_bat_st, smu_versions
mapper.select: select t.*,ti.smu_id 'smu_id_nu' from terminals_info ti LEFT JOIN terminals t ON t.smu_id=ti.smu_id where ti.project_id = #{projectId} order by t.Id desc
mapper.insert: insert into terminals (Id, create_time, update_time, smu_id, smu_rssi, smu_status, smu_voltage, times_interval) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{smuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smuRssi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smuStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smuPowSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smuBatSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smuVersions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smuVoltage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timesInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into terminals
Id,
create_time,
update_time,
smu_id,
smu_rssi,
smu_status,
smu_pow_st,
smu_bat_st,
smu_versions,
smu_voltage,
times_interval,

mapper.update:
update terminals
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
smu_id = #{smuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smu_rssi = #{smuRssi,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smu_status = #{smuStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smu_pow_st = #{smuPowSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smu_bat_st = #{smuBatSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smu_versions = #{smuVersions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smu_voltage = #{smuVoltage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
times_interval = #{timesInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update terminals set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, smu_id = #{smuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smu_rssi = #{smuRssi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smu_status = #{smuStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smu_pow_st = #{smuPowSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smu_bat_st = #{smuBatSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smu_versions = #{smuVersions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smu_voltage = #{smuVoltage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, times_interval = #{timesInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
